name: Somethings on moon colony 6
description:
I am Sergeant Hector Pay and we have received an SOS from the colonists who are hiding somewhere on this base. Space mice got into the wirings and now the Luna defence bots are not recognising friend from foe.

Your equipment has been scattered around the base, but fortunately your pulse gun materialized close by. Collect your gun, find the colonists, and save the day!

CONTROLS

Keyboard:

WASD -  move

Space - fire

N Drill

J Control Robots

Joypad:

B Fire

A Jump

x Drill

Y Control Robots 

Game By 

TeePeeDee

Compososer

Ominous Pigeon Master

Made for MVM XVI

See you in the next jam
